summary: EXPERIENCED VEHICLE VIBRATION WHEN APPLYING BRAKES.  THE DEALER TOLD ME IT WAS NOT UNDER WARRENTY AND IT HAD TO DO WITH DRIVER'S BRAKING HABITS, BUT THIS IS OUR SECOND GRAND CHEROKEE AND NEVER EXPERIENCED THIS PROBLEM BEFORE.  I HAD THE ROTORS (TWO FRONT) TURNED, BUT IT IS DOING IT AGAIN AFTER 5 MONTHS.  I TOOK IT IN AGAIN, AND THEY TELL ME THE ROTORS (TWO FRONT) NEED TO BE TURNED AGAIN.  FROM ALL THE COMPLAINTS I SEE AND HEAR ABOUT, IT SEEMS THERE IS A PROBLEM WITH THESE VEHICLES.
